messages.min_length: New password must be at least 8 characters long!

items.unique: Use a unique password that you don't use elsewhere
items.rotate: Change your password every 90 days for maximum security
items.share: Never share your password, even with colleagues or IT support
items.logout: Log out when using shared or public computers
items.contact: Contact IT immediately if you suspect unauthorized access

checks.format_idle: Gosti faayilii JPG yookaan PNG ta'uu qaba.
checks.ratio_idle: Suuraan bifa squaretti dhiyaataa ta'uu qaba.
checks.format_invalid: Gosti faayilii hin deeggaramne: {{type}}. JPG yookaan PNG fayyadami.
checks.size_invalid: Hammamni faayilii sirrii miti: {{sizeKb}}KB. Daangaan hayyamame 10KB hanga 2048KB dha.
checks.dimensions_invalid: Safarri suuraa sirrii miti: {{width}}x{{height}}. Daangaan hayyamame 200x200 hanga 2000x2000 dha.
checks.ratio_invalid: Raashiyoon suuraa sirrii miti: {{ratio}}. Daangaan hayyamame 0.80 hanga 1.25 dha.
checks.dimensions_unreadable: Safarri suuraa dubbisuu hin dandeenye. Suuraa JPG yookaan PNG sirrii olkaa'i.
checks.ratio_unreadable: Sababa metadata suuraa hin dubbifamneef raashiyoo mirkaneessuu hin dandeenye.

errors.invalid_file_type: Olkaa'insi dhoorkame: JPG fi PNG qofa hayyamamu.
errors.file_too_large: Olkaa'insi dhoorkame: hammamni faayilii 2MB yookaan gadi ta'uu qaba.
errors.file_too_small: Olkaa'insi dhoorkame: faayiliin baay'ee xiqqaa dha. Suuraa qulqullina gaarii qabu fayyadami.
errors.invalid_dimensions: Olkaa'insi dhoorkame: safarri suuraa daangaa hayyamame keessaa ala dha.
errors.invalid_dimensions_with_values: Olkaa'insi dhoorkame: suuraan {{width}}x{{height}} dha. Daangaan barbaachisu 200x200 hanga 2000x2000 dha.
errors.invalid_ratio: Olkaa'insi dhoorkame: raashiyoon suuraa daangaa hayyamame keessaa ala dha.
errors.invalid_ratio_with_value: Olkaa'insi dhoorkame: raashiyoon {{ratio}} dha; 0.80 hanga 1.25 qofa hayyamama.

help_support.title: Help & Support

items.employee: Employees can apply and track leaves.
items.hr: HR manages policies, types, and reports.
